name: Two Doors to Die
description:
A single-player, first person mystery set in a neo-noir subway train, with a unique, classic film aesthetic.
Solve the disappearance of a client of yours by piecing together all the clues the police won't handle. Be your own detective.

Casual, Indie. Full controller support.

Game design and visual scripting - Jason Mallet.

Narrative design and audio - Tristan Jacobs.

Art - Elisa Moriconi.
